analyzed: nava ślokī
ārya aṣṭa sāhaśrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: sarvā pāramitās tatra tādātmyena vyavasthitāḥ // Nś_1 //
analyzed: sarvā pāramitāḥ tatra tādātmyena vyavasthitāḥ
niṣprapañcā nirābhāsā nirvikalpā nirālayā
niḥsvabhāvā parā sūkṣmā bindu nāda vivarjitā
prajñāpāramitā mātā sarva buddha udayā parā
prajñāpāramitām saṃyak yaḥ bhāvayitum icchati
tena arthataḥ nava ślokāḥ cintanīyāḥ samāsatas
karma prabhāva saṃbhūtam ṣaṣ āyatana lakṣaṇam

original: punarbhavam iti khyātaṃ pratibhāsopamaṃ hi tat // Nś_5_[1] //
analyzed: punarbhavam iti khyātam pratibhāsa upamam hi tat
nirmitam nagaram yadvat vilokayati nirmitaḥ

original: tadvat paśyati rūpāṇi karmabhir nirmitaṃ jagat // Nś_6_[2] //
analyzed: tadvat paśyati rūpāṇi karmabhiḥ nirmitam jagat

original: dharmaṃ deśayataḥ śabdā ye kecit śrutigocarāḥ /
analyzed: dharmam deśayataḥ śabdāḥ ye kecid śruti gocarāḥ
pratiśrutkā upamāḥ sarve prodbhūta śrutinaḥ śrutāḥ
svāditam tathā spraṣṭam viṣaya lālāsaiḥ

original: svapnatulyam idaṃ sarvam upalabdhaṃ na vidyate // Nś_8_[4] //
analyzed: svapna tulyam idam sarvam upalabdham na vidyate

original: māyāyantro naro yadvad bhinnāṃ ceṣṭāṃ karoti vai /
analyzed: māyā yantraḥ naraḥ yadvat bhinnām ceṣṭām karoti vai

original: tadvad ceṣṭāṃ karoty eva dehayantro nirātmakaḥ // Nś_9_[5] //
analyzed: tadvat ceṣṭām karoti eva deha yantraḥ nirātmakaḥ
nānā upalabdhayaḥ yāḥ ca prati kṣaṇa samudbhavāḥ
marīci sadṛśāḥ ca ete dṛṣṭa naṣṭāḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ
pratibimba nibham grāhyam anādi citta saṃbhavam
tad ākāram ca vijñānam anyonya pratibimbavat
dhyāyinām svaccha saṃtāne yat jnana indu samudbhavam

original: udakacandropamaṃ tad dhi pratyakṣaṃ na vidyate // Nś_12_[8] //
analyzed: udaka candra upamam tat hi pratyakṣam na vidyate

original: yoginām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy ākāśalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: yoginām api yat jñānam tat api ākāśa lakṣaṇam

original: tasmāj jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca sarvam ākāśalakṣaṇam // Nś_13_[9] //
analyzed: tasmāt jñānam ca jñeyam ca sarvam ākāśa lakṣaṇam
iti cintayataḥ tattvam sarva bhāveṣu anāśritam
bodhi praṇidhi cittena jñānam agram bhaviṣyati
ārya aṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ piṇḍa arthaḥ samāptaḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam śrī kambala ambara pādanām
